mapper.update: UPDATE exhbn SET exhbnTitle = #{exhbnTitle}, exhbnImgUrl = #{exhbnImgUrl}, exhbnUrl = #{exhbnUrl}, exhbnPlaceUrl = #{exhbnPlaceUrl}, exhbnArea = #{exhbnArea}, exhbnPlace = #{exhbnPlace}, exhbnPlaceAddr = #{exhbnPlaceAddr}, exhbnStartDate = #{exhbnStartDate}, exhbnEndDate = #{exhbnEndDate}, exhbnPrice = #{exhbnPrice}, exhbnPrice1 = #{exhbnPrice1}, exhbnContent = #{exhbnContent}, exhbnPhone = #{exhbnPhone}, exhbnWriter = #{exhbnWriter}, exhbnHostOrganizer = #{exhbnHostOrganizer}, exhbnNum = #{exhbnNum}, gpsX = #{gpsX}, gpsY = #{gpsY}, viewState = #{viewState} WHERE exhbnId = #{exhbnId}
